transcript:
Customer: Baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, good morning sir. Sir, hello.
Customer: Good morning. Sir, Rajesh Pandey baat kar raha hu. Haan Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hu. Haan ji, sir.
Executive: Haan ji sir, Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hu main.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji aapne customer care phone number care wale number pe call kiya hai to aapki profile hai na to mere paas hi aati hai jab aap customer care ko call karte ho na.
Customer: Hello. Oh Bhanu ji to mere ko bata hi nahi pa rahi ki kab tak ho jayegi complete aapki profile. Unke paas to jawab nahi hai.
Executive: Achha unhone nahi bola kuch.
Customer: Fir ek baar main fir se discussion ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai sir, ek baar main fir se discussion. Mere ko unko bolna mere ko mail pe likh ke de do. Mere ko mail pe likh ke de do ki aap se nahi ho raha aisa karke koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Haan. Koi dikkat nahi hai. Mail pe likh ke ye de de.
Executive: Main to main apni team laga dunga main usko. Main apni team laga dunga main apni team se kar lunga koi dikkat nahi hai. Ek aapne review to check kiya bhaiya kaisa hua wo review ka?
Customer: Nahi sir. Theek hai ye kab tak ho jayega aapka fresh ye sari cheeze. Uspe mail pe likh ke de de aapka kab tak ye pura listing ho jayegi sari cheeze ye likh ke de de.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Ek main batau na aapko. Mere catalog hai na ek mahine ka ek saal ho jayega main nahi sudhrega main bata raha hu aapko. Ya to mere ko hi karni padegi clear si baat kar raha hu. Kyunki aap nahi kar paoge. Mera kaam badh raha hai koi dikkat nahi hai. Meri service ki quality ye hai ki ab aap aap log plan kaun lega mere se ye batao aap.
Executive: Plan kaun sa sir?
Customer: Achha renewal. Renewal ka plan to khatam ho raha hai to renewal ka plan kaun lega mere ko ye batao aap.
Executive: Ab wo to account manager hote hain jaise suppose that mere pe ye allot hoga na. Agar is mere paas raha to otherwise beech mein changes hua kuch bhi hua to pata nahi kiske paas gaya sir.
Customer: To ye cheeze hai. Koi issue nahi hai bhaiya main to India mart se main change karwa ke main ya to kisi aur main chale jaunga kyunki main bilkul bhi khush nahi hu aapke India mart se. Bilkul bhi khush nahi hu.
Executive: Unsatisfied service hai aap logo ki really.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Nahi sir bas jitna ho sakega apna best karunga aur iske liye bhi jo aap review rating ka bol rahe the uske liye bhi main baat karne wala hi tha. Do review rating hai ek ye yam likh ke hai Raipur Chhattisgarh Rajasthan ka hai ice cream freezer na aur ek Vishnu ji ka theek hai. Aur Abdul ji ka aaya hai aur Rukma single star. Char ho gaya theek hai char single star hai theek hai. To uske liye bhi main baat karunga aur jitna hoga main daily ka main promise kar raha hu daily ka 20 product aapke isme add karke jaunga daily anyhow daily. Ab 588 product hai sir 588 product ko divide kar wo kar lijiye jab tak mere paas hai tab tak ki baat kar raha hu. Ab aapko ek cheez aur bata deta hu Bhanu ji ko pata hi nahi Muradabad mein kitne product add hai mere se 155 ki baat kar rahe hain waha pe itne product add hai. Unko pata hi nahi kya chal kya raha hai. Ek second rukiye main bata de raha hu aapke paas kitna. Bhanu ji ko pata hi ha wo thoda wo dekhte hain achanak hai to is vajah se main Muradabad location. Ha mujhe nahi handle. Nahi handle kyun nahi hoga customer ki chalegi hum logo ki thodi chalegi sir main ye thodi keh raha hu na handle har ek cheez karunga na. Sab kuch karunga Raj and sun is 300 something maine bataya tha na aapko us din product ab main fir dekh le raha hu kitna hai product line pe rahiye. Aur ye maine ticket bhi abhi raise kari hai to isko galti se bhi aapko hatana nahi hai jab tak main na ok karu aapko. Theek hai. Ha ha ha wo raise ho gaya hai. Theek hai. Then. Mere ko ek kaam karo aap. Ab isme sir aapke jo total product hai 300 product active product hai. Hello. Meri baat suniye meri baat suniye meri baat. Haan haan. Jo aapke jo B features jo ho gaye na catalog jaise add on hota hai product add kara haan to ek category wise hoti hai to category wise kaise show hoti hai mere ko agar uske whatsapp pe photo bhej do. Main usme kuch ya to kuch changes kar leta hu taki easily aap jae. Haan haan haan. Theek hai wo bhi main add kar dunga categories wise ki dekhiye sir aap keh rahe the sham ko bol rahe the ab ye dekhiye teeno product isme Raj and sun wale mein jo Muradabad ki location hai na main aapko photo de de raha hu teeno photo same hi hai aisa koi images isme hai hi nahi main dikha de raha hu aapko. Ye dekhiye do ka aa raha hai main change kar dunga aur koi dikkat nahi main khud dekh ke main change kar dunga aapko. Haan to dekhiye kai sare aise product hai Raj and sun mein to wo kar raha hu na sir ye dekhiye. Theek hai main aapko call back karta hu urgent call aao. Theek hai sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's profile update is not completed.

- Wants to know who will take renewal plan.

- Unhappy with IndiaMART's service.

- Wants review rating issues to be resolved.

- Wants category wise product display on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve profile update issue.

- Executive will check on review rating issues.

- Executive will help with category wise product display.

- Executive will call back urgently.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back urgently.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile update, renewal plan, review rating, catalog
